description:
The body of murdered neighborhood nuisance Amagi is discovered, and neighborhood association president Bando also appears to have been poisoned pesticides. The police believe Bando chose to kill himself after murdering Amagi, but... A piece of evidence discovered at Bando`s home leads to college professor Chino becoming the prime suspect. However, Conan realizes something off about the case and reasons that the real killer framed Chino. Conan suspects Fukuda and Hiro, but while investigating them discovers an important clue at the cafe and realizes what really happened and the identity of the real killer...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mystères et rebondissements à Beika (2e partie)
The Shifting Mystery of Beika City (Part 2)
米花町二転三転ミステリー (後編)
